mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_session ( user_id, title, type, status, message_count, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted, last_message_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{type}, #{status}, #{messageCount}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{isDeleted}, #{lastMessageTime} );
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_session WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0;
SELECT * FROM chat_session WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY last_message_time DESC, created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_session WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_session SET title = #{title}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, message_count = #{messageCount}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, last_message_time = #{lastMessageTime} WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0;
UPDATE chat_session SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE chat_session SET message_count = #{messageCount}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0;
UPDATE chat_session SET last_message_time = #{lastMessageTime}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0;
